scripts.dev:electron: wait-on http://localhost:5173 && VITE_DEV_SERVER_URL=http://localhost:5173 bunx electron apps/desktop/.electron/main.js
scripts.dev:all: bun run electron:build && concurrently -k -n WEB,ELEC -c green,cyan "bun run dev:desktop" "bun run dev:electron"
scripts.electron:build: bun build apps/desktop/electron/preload.ts --outfile apps/desktop/.electron/preload.cjs --target node --format cjs --external electron --external better-sqlite3 && bun build apps/desktop/electron/main.ts --outdir apps/desktop/.electron --target node --format esm --external electron --external better-sqlite3
scripts.electron:watch: concurrently -k -n PRELOAD,MAIN -c yellow,magenta "bun build apps/desktop/electron/preload.ts --outfile apps/desktop/.electron/preload.cjs --target node --format cjs --external electron --external better-sqlite3 --watch" "bun build apps/desktop/electron/main.ts --outdir apps/desktop/.electron --target node --format esm --external electron --external better-sqlite3 --watch"
